entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
